data.eml:eml: Overview of the genus Briareum (Cnidaria, Octocorallia, Briareidae) in the Indo-Pacific, with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Samimi-Namin, Kaveh, van Ofwegen, Leen P. (2016): Overview of the genus Briareum (Cnidaria, Octocorallia, Briareidae) in the Indo-Pacific, with the description of a new species. ZooKeys 557: 1-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.557.6298, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.557.6298
